articles.description: The Pittsburgh Penguins will load up their lineup for the Detroit Red Wings on Tuesday night. That means Sidney Crosby and Evgeni Malkin will play. It should be fun viewing, and you’ll get to see the new/old Evgeni Malkin that we’ve seen in training camp. Spo…

articles.title: PRESEASON FINAL – Kings 2, Golden Knights 1 (OT) – Fiala, Copley, McLellan - LA Kings Insider
articles.description: The LA Kings went to overtime for the second straight night in the preseason but came away with their first victory, a 2-1 win over the Vegas Golden Knights on Monday evening at T-Mobile Arena. Forward Kevin Fiala scored his first (preseason) goal in a Kings …
